summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerLift AI Career Transition Platform. Tested backend APIs, frontend UI flows, user authentication, resume parsing, dashboard functionality, and results page. Most core features working correctly with persistent Claude API timeout issues and minor frontend clipboard permission error.

critical_bugs.issue: Claude API calls still timing out after 30 seconds
critical_bugs.impact: Career analysis feature fails for new analyses - prevents users from creating new career assessments
critical_bugs.details: Despite using claude-sonnet-4-20250514 model, API calls are taking longer than 30 seconds causing timeouts. Existing analysis retrieval works perfectly.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied error when copying CV content
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot copy CV content to clipboard
ui_bugs.details: NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied. Webpack dev overlay also blocking some interactions.

passed_tests: Landing page loads with professional design and hero section
User authentication flow (Sign In button, login form, dashboard redirect)
Dashboard loads with usage stats and personalized greeting
Results page loads and displays complete analysis data
Career fit rating displays correctly (GOOD - 78% score)
All result tabs functional (Skills Analysis, Learning Path, CV Versions, Next Steps)
Resume parsing endpoint (POST /api/resume/parse) with text parsing
AI roles endpoint (GET /api/roles) returns 20 roles correctly
Usage tracking endpoint (GET /api/usage) shows correct limits
Analysis data retrieval with complete sections (career_fit, ats_score, transferable_skills, skill_gaps, learning_path, cv_natural, cv_ats_optimized, next_steps)

success_percentage.backend: 90% (9/10 core endpoints working, 1 critical timeout issue)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Core UI flows working, results page functional, minor clipboard issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Claude API timeout issue in career analysis endpoint (/api/analyze). The API calls are consistently timing out after 30 seconds, preventing new analysis creation. Consider: 1) Implementing async processing with status polling, 2) Optimizing Claude prompt to reduce response time, 3) Increasing timeout limits to 60-90 seconds, 4) Adding retry logic with exponential backoff. MINOR: Fix clipboard permission error in results page CV copy functionality.
